summary: The sealed interface ProcEnv defines a set of rules for process environments. It has two functions: addRule to add rules with unique IDs, and applyRule to execute the rule corresponding to a specific process ID.

details.comment: The sealed interface ProcEnv defines a set of rules for process environments. It has two functions: addRule to add rules with unique IDs, and applyRule to execute the rule corresponding to a specific process ID.
